creator_contributor_role: University of California, Los Angeles, production company

subject_group: Crime, Espionage, Justice, Police & Prisons/Probation - United States
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Probation - United States
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Social service
description: Demonstrates how the probation service responds to a youthful narcotics offender who - unbeknownst to the people coming into contact with him - is a probation employee himself. This film shows Rick assuming the role of 'offender" and going through the same interview process as actual offender would go through.
